sentences: Hiroya Ozaki (尾崎 裕哉, Ozaki Hiroya, born 24 July 1989) is a Japanese singer-songwriter.
Ozaki was born on 24 July 1989 in Tokyo, Japan, to Japanese singer songwriter Yutaka Ozaki and Shigemi Ozaki.

sentences: In July 2016, he appeared on the television music show Ongaku no Hi, and played his father's song "I Love You" and his first original song, "Hajimari no Machi".

sentences: In September 2016, Ozaki embarked his first live concert as a solo singer, entitled Billboard Classics Hiroya Ozaki Premium Concert: Hajimari no Machi, at Yomiuri Otemachi Hall.

sentences: Ozaki's debut single "Hajimari no Machi" was released in September 2016, through Toy's Factory.

sentences: His first extended play Let Freedom Ring was released in March 2017 to a commercial success, reaching number twenty-one in Japan.
